step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You are maintaining a comfortable posture. Ensure you are placing hands on your abdomen.
Great inhale! Remember to tighten your whole body muscles and visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Visualize pushing fluid out as you breathe out.
You're starting the second repetition well. Continue to focus on tightening your whole body.
Good posture and hand placement. Keep breathing deeply.
Nice inhale and muscle tightening. Visualize the fluid movement as you breathe in.
Well done relaxing and exhaling. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out with each exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your whole body and visualizing fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale slowly through your mouth, relaxing your muscles and visualizing pushing fluid out. Keep up the good work!
